2007450.name: Knight's Retreat - Tilt Five Edition
2007450.description:
ENJOY A NEW OPTIONAL AUGMENTED REALITY EXPERIENCE WITH THE TILT FIVE™ SYSTEM!

Knights Retreat now supports Tilt Five™!

Level up your game night with tabletop holograms! The Tilt Five™ holographic gaming system transforms tabletop and video games into 3D vibrant holographic environments. Using the Tilt Five™ augmented reality (AR) glasses, Gameboard, and Wand Controller, you can immerse yourself — and your friends — in experiences like never before. Visit Tilt Five's website to find out how to bring Knights Retreat alive on your tabletop!

With Tilt Five™, players will see the beautiful 3D art of Knights Retreat coming to life in an incredible augmented reality experience!
2007450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
